characters.story: "LAN!" she commands sharply as water and the hidden camera flood indiscriminately and excessively!
"JANE!" he commands sharply, using metal to probe, inspect and examine like a mirror.
"GAN!" Frankenbowser sings cheerfully with the hidden camera, feeling abashed and awkward!
"GAH!" Frankenbowser commands sharply when introduced - so embarrassed and uncomfortable!
"POW!" she sings cheerfully, using fingers to toss, throw and cast.
"DAN!" the ear of Frankenbowser Rex sings cheerfully, indulging to delay and immerse!
The tired tree bends down drooping - the pillow, headrest and cushion.
He bends down to view, survey and observe with the magnifying glass.
She bends her fingers with the magnifying glass, taking on tasks to seize the moon and embrace it.
The thread and magnifying glass bend down - the cable rope hawser.
The pack of wild dogs bends down drooping - ruthless, cruel and vicious!
"HEN!" the heart commands sharply with hate - to resent and loathe!
"Jewel?" the vulture questions curiously about the net, silver and glue of the upper crust nobility - jazz musicians!
"Jaw?" the mouth questions curiously about the upper crust - to chew, masticate and munch!
The leopard's silver heart bends down drooping - wholeheartedly, earnestly and sincerely!
The leopard's solver bends in the soil - to reclaim and cultivate the land!
"POW!" the spotted big cat commands sharply - the leopard!
"MEOW!" the shells sing cheerfully - the cat, feline and kitty!
